title: Arie & Lauren Luyendyk, Plus: Co-Host Joe Amabile
description:
Lauren and Arie talk about their life as a family of three with baby Alessi. Plus, Rachel recalls the first time she heard about Lauren, right after Arie wrapped up filming his season of “The Bachelor.”

Be sure to rate and subscribe so you never miss an episode.
